title: Like you, like me: see what I feel
creator_credit: Alan P. Sloan and Encyclopaedia Britannica Educational Corporation
brief_description: An animated film which dramatises how a child copes with blindness. Designed to encourage discussion of attitudes toward the blind and to show that a blind or visually impaired child can do many things that other children do.
